Package de.cocolab.reuse.test

Test classes for verifying the correct operation of the Cocktail de.cocolab.reuse package.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DynArrDrv Test class for class DynArray.
ErrorDrv Test Errors, the error reporting module.
ExceptionsDrv Tests exception handling using the MaskedException class.
IdentDrv Test IdentTable and Ident.
IODrv Tests the IO functionality in classes CocktailWriter and CocktailReader.
SetDrv Simple test of class Set.
TestDriver Test envelope for the reuse package.
 

Package de.cocolab.reuse.test Description

Test classes for verifying the correct operation of the Cocktail de.cocolab.reuse package.

The class TestDriver exercises the complete package. It may be compiled and run using the test target of the Makefile.

Alternatively, the individual test classes may be invoked by themselves.
